name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Shining Memory ⧸ ラストに重大告知‼【#星街すいせい5周年LIVE 】 [GbIIr3waYzI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Introductory sequence promoting the mobile game 'Bang Dream! Girls Band Party!'.
Performance of the song 'KU-RU-RU-RU Cruller!' by Hoshimachi Suisei.
Transition to the performance of the song 'Summer Gates'.

subtitles.original: 空は繋がっているよ

subtitles.english: The sea is connected too (with you)

subtitles.english: Because we can meet in our hearts
